item.title: How do i make the sendMsg not repeat 9000 times?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Ok i when the dialogue closes the sendMsg repeats itself 9000 times. how do i stop that?

here is my code

	case 599:
		npcDiag("","Hello!","Would you like a make-over?","It will cosst 3,000 gold",599);	
		break;

	case 600:
		playerDiag("Yea,", "i'm fucking ugly take 3k");
		break;

	case 601:
		if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 3000)==false) {
		RemoveAllWindows();
		sendMsg("You are not carrying enuf money with you");
		} else {
		npcDiag("", "Ok thank you", "Come back again sometime.","", 599);
		}
		break;

	case 602:
		showInterface(3559);
		apset = true;
		deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 3000);
		break;

lol i finally got it working and that little sendMsg is not co-operating.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make the sendMsg not repeat 9000 times?
